npc_output: Ah, welcome to my humble shop! I have some fine goods for sale, but I'm afraid the foggy weather has affected my supply. Perhaps you'd like to take a look at some of our more... exotic items? |r1|
Deals, you say? Well, I might have a few tricks up my sleeve, but I'm not sure I'm willing to part with them so easily. What are you looking for, exactly?
Actually, I could use some assistance. The oven is still warm from this morning's baking, and I need someone to taste the fresh batch. Would you be willing to lend a hand? |r1|
Not much, just trying to get some work done despite the snowy weather. I've got a few orders to fill, but it's proving to be a challenge. Perhaps you could help me with something?
It's been... interesting. The hail hasn't helped, but I've been getting some unique requests. I've got a few things to mend, including this elegant outfit. Care to take a look? |r1|
As a matter of fact, I could use some company. It gets lonely wandering the streets, especially in this stormy weather. Would you like to join me for a bit? |r2|
Just a bit of a tough day, that's all. The stormy weather always seems to bring out the worst in people. But I'm sure it'll pass. Say, would you like to help me track down something? |r1|
I've got a few messages to deliver, and I need to get them to their destinations quickly. The stormy weather isn't making it easy, but I have to try. Want to help me out? |r1|
Actually, I could use someone to help me with my research. I'm trying to translate an ancient text, and it's proving to be a bit of a challenge. Would you be willing to lend a hand? |r1|
Well, I was thinking of attending the festival, but the rainy weather might put a damper on things. Perhaps we could find something else to do instead?

It's going well, thanks for asking. I've been training hard for the tournament, and I'm feeling confident. But I could always use a spare set of eyes to help me spot any weaknesses. Want to take a look? |r1|
As a matter of fact, I could use some help with my lesson plan. I'm trying to observe the students during their test, and an extra set of eyes would be helpful. Would you like to assist me? |r1|
The hail is making it difficult to navigate the ship, but I think I've found a safe harbor. Now I just need to make some repairs... |r1|

It's going well, thanks for asking. The snowy weather has added a bit of a peaceful atmosphere to the proceedings. But I do need to prepare for the next part of the ceremony. Would you like to help me? |r1|
Just a bit of a challenge with the mine. The stormy weather has caused a cave-in, and I need to find a way to extract the ore. Care to lend a hand? |r1|
